ovdesc.p: The table is used to handle the payments that are moved to Risk filter queue with status 625 and to do breaching the risk filter conditions.
Payment form Risk Filter queue can be approved and allow to proceed further or Reject and moved to Repair status

desc.p: This field is a no input filed. System will populate the daily amount limit defined in the respective risk filter condition while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
